name: CoinFLEX
introduce: CoinFLEX is committed to providing institutional and retail investors a platform to earn and trade crypto. CoinFLEX creates innovative solutions to bring investors and crypto markets together through intuitive yield products such as flexUSD, the interest-earning stablecoin, and AMM+, the capital-efficient automated market maker. Coinflex also operates SmartBCH, a sidechain for BCH that uses Tendermint for consensus.
